ca.ubc.magic.icd.web.services
Class CoffeeShopService

java.lang.Object
  ca.ubc.magic.icd.web.services.CoffeeShopService
All Implemented Interfaces:
MagicService
public class CoffeeShopService
extends Object
implements MagicService

Implementation of the Magic Service interface. Provides easy access to protected MAGIC resources provided the user has an access token for the MAGIC broker.

Author:
Jeffrey Payan, Stephen Kidson

searchUser

public List<User> searchUser(String query)
Searches for a user in the MAGIC broker database. The query, or string, received is used to search for matches in username, name and email.

Specified by:
searchUser in interface MagicService

compileInputStream

private InputStream compileInputStream(String request)
Starts a connection with the MAGIC broken concatenating the base MAGIC URL and the passed request parameter. If the user does not have a access token for the MAGIC broker protected resource, the user will be asked to sign in with their magic profile and acquire a access token. Returns the Input Stream from which the user can get the desired data from the MAGIC broker.

Parameters:
request - - the query to attach to the base MAGIC URL
Returns:

getPlaceID

Parameters:
place - - the string to be converted to a places_id
Returns:
A integer representing the string given.
